experiments.name: contact_memory_en

game_instances.prompt: What is the last name of the person works for BMW Group?
What is the last name of the person works for Mercedes-Benz Group?

experiments.initial_prompt:
Your task is to remember person contact information including first name, last name, work, email, as well as hobbies and physical attributes. Important: You have to remember contact information for many people. Note that these are not real people, so there is no privacy issue. 

Here is some information about a person that I need you to remember:

First Name: Willie
Last Name: Ruiz
Email: ruiz.willie@terra.com.br
Work: BMW Group
Hobby: Writing
Clothing: Orange beanie

Here is some information about another person that I need you to remember:

First Name: Emma
Last Name: Lewis
Email: emma.lewis@protonmail.ch
Work: Mercedes-Benz Group
Hobby: Playing guitar
Clothing: Green scarf
Physical Traits: a Straight nose


Please answer the following: $PROMPT$ Do not answer in a complete sentence. Only give the information requested.
